        <message>If you have a Mid Server that you dont have direct shell access to, you can execute shell commands via an ECC queue. Could also be useful to sub-shell commands to other things installed on that mid server. 

```javascript
var probe = SncProbe.get("Command");
probe.setName("ls -lrta");
probe.setSource("Shell Command");
probe.addParameter("skip_sensor", true);
var output = probe.create("mid-123123");
```

If you go to ecc_queue you can filter to Response To from the variable output above (sys_id)

The payload will have your stderr and stdout from your shell command

Source: LinkedIn</message>
